1.0.0.name: wordpress/bigcontentsearch-shortcode
1.0.0.description:
Provides shortcodes for title and content that allow you to source content from Big Content Search database.

Usecase example: autoblog platform BlogSenseWP uses these shortcodes to automatically post content to your blog.

Membership with Big Content Search is required to use this plugin.

Big Content Search is a paid service that provides an API accessible database containing over 100,000 unrestricted PLR articles. You can find articles in more than 200 niches, all easily searchable.
